content: Display is still not optimized for small screens and zooming in for details and trying to look around requires permanent touch with two fingers - if it works at all. Handling is irritating if you are used to a real computer for browsing and shopping. I hate that this is a system app on my phone and can't be uninstalled. I don't want to use it, I don't want to shop online with this phone anyways, and it's using up storage space for no reason on a very low storage phone. Plus it opens up if I accidentally tap an add, which is very easy to do, and then uses more of my already poor quality internet connection, and doesn't let me leave the app easily! Even if I liked Amazon, I wouldn't like this app.
